participant_1.name: Eli Cohen
participant_1.personality: Confident and witty, Eli enjoys making light of situations and often uses humor to connect with others.
participant_1.background: i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i'm a stunt double as my second job. i was raised in a single parent household. i read twenty books a year.

participant_2.name: Sarah Johnson
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Sarah is focused on her family and career, often reflecting on her experiences and sharing knowledge.
participant_2.background: i'm pregnant with my first child. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.
